mapper.sql: account_id, account_name, app_id, mobile, email, app_code, valid_flag, created_date, created_user, updated_date, updated_user
mapper.select:
select
from t_account t
and app_id like CONCAT('%', #{appId}, '%')
and account_name like CONCAT('%', #{accountName}, '%')
and app_code like CONCAT('%', #{appCode}, '%')
and mobile like CONCAT('%', #{mobile}, '%')
and email like CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
and valid_flag = #{validFlag}
mapper.insert: insert into t_account (account_id, account_name, app_id, mobile, email, app_code, valid_flag, created_date, created_user, updated_date, updated_user) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_account
account_id,
account_name,
app_id,
mobile,
email,
app_code,
valid_flag,
created_date,
created_user,
updated_date,
updated_user,

mapper.update:
update t_account
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_code = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_account set account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_code = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
